entry.data:
AREAS OF DENSE FOG THIS MORNING
MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
SOUTH WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY AND BREEZY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE AROUND 60
SOUTH WINDS 20 TO 25 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 35 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S

MOSTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF RAIN SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S

PARTLY CLOUDY WITH A 30 PERCENT CHANCE OF RAIN SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
